tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE travel_safety_tips (
    tip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tip_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE safety_precautions (
    precaution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    precaution_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE travel_destinations (
    destination_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    destination_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE travel_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    destination_id INT,
    reviewer_name TEXT,
    review_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE EmergencyContacts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    country_name TEXT,
    emergency_number TEXT,
    contact_name TEXT,
    contact_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE TravelReviews (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    destination TEXT,
    review_title TEXT,
    review_comment TEXT,
    rating INT
);
